networkplugin.name: MdotM
networkplugin.info_content:
Network Info

MdotM takes the complexity out of advertising and helps you the advertiser target users more accurately, efficiently, and cost-effectively through our direct partnerships with publishers and real-time bidding exchanges. We help you bid on users that bring you the most value through real-time atttribution — leading to improved conversion rates and increased campaign ROI.

Ad Formats

Mojiva supports both Banner Ads and Text Ads

Best Countries

USA
